title: Sidewall, "Cobwebs", 2004
dimensions: Overall: 325 x 61 cm (10 ft. 7 15/16 in. x 24 in.)
description: A large tree grows up the right side of the design with a large bird perched on a branch.  A cobweb suspends from its branches. Outgrowth of small flowers at treetop. A second bird sits at the base of the tree while a butterfly is in flight. Printed in a pale yellow and mauve on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Sidewall, "Cobwebs", 2004.Linoleum block-printed on paper. Gift of Marthe Armitage. 2005-26-1.
